languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простор Коронус{/g}... каково название, а?" {n}Джай деланно прищуривается от удовольствия.{/n} "Но не в эту окраину я бежала изначально, шерин. Нет, в Простор Коронус меня позже привели слухи о небывалой свободе, коей щедро наделены все, кто выжил в этих краях. Тут все дороги открыты — и в святые, и в богатеи, и в вершители чужих судеб, да куда душа изволит. Здесь окупаются старания тех, кто не привык возлежать ленно и сетовать на жизнь, а вместо того трудится денно и нощно на благо — души ли, славы иль казны своей. Я из таких. И здесь я нашла свое благословение".

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простор Коронус{/g}... каково название, а?" {n}Джай деланно прищуривается от удовольствия.{/n} "Но не в эту окраину я бежала изначально, шерин. Нет, в Простор Коронус меня позже привели слухи о небывалой свободе, коей щедро наделены все, кто выжил в этих краях. Тут все дороги открыты — и в святые, и в богатеи, и в вершители чужих судеб, да куда душа изволит. Здесь окупаются старания тех, кто не привык возлежать ленно и сетовать на жизнь, а вместо того трудится денно и нощно на благо — души ли, славы иль казны своей. Я из таких. И здесь я нашла свое благословение".

languages.text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}... A gorgeous name, isn't it?" {n}Jae closes her eyes for a moment in an exaggerated show of pleasure.{/n} "But this backwater wasn't my original destination when I escaped, shereen. Oh no, it was the rumours of incredible freedom that brought me to the Koronus Expanse, freedom that is generously bestowed upon everyone who can survive in these parts. All doors are open here — you can become a saint, a mogul, a kingmaker, or anyone you like, really. Here, hard work pays off, unless you're used to lying by the roadside and complaining instead of toiling for the good of your soul, glory, wallet, or whatever floats your boat. I'm used to working hard. And so I found my blessing."
languages.original_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простор Коронус{/g}... каково название, а?" {n}Джай деланно прищуривается от удовольствия.{/n} "Но не в эту окраину я бежала изначально, шерин. Нет, в Простор Коронус меня позже привели слухи о небывалой свободе, коей щедро наделены все, кто выжил в этих краях. Тут все дороги открыты — и в святые, и в богатеи, и в вершители чужих судеб, да куда душа изволит. Здесь окупаются старания тех, кто не привык возлежать ленно и сетовать на жизнь, а вместо того трудится денно и нощно на благо — души ли, славы иль казны своей. Я из таких. И здесь я нашла свое благословение".

traits.locale_text: "The Koronus Expanse... A gorgeous name, isn't it?" {n}Jae squints with mock pleasure.{/n} "But this backwater wasn't my original destination when I escaped, shereen. Oh no, it were the rumors of incredible freedom that brought me to the Koronus expanse, one that is generously bestowed upon everyone who can survive in these parts. All doors are open here — you can become a saint, a mogul, a kingmaker or anyone you like, really. The efforts here pay off unless you're used to lying by the roadside and complaining instead of working hard for the good of your soul, glory, wallet or whatever flows your boat. I am used to working hard. And so I found my blessing."

languages.text: “{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}……真是个美妙的名字，不是吗？”{n}婕伊闭上双眼，夸张地表现出一副高兴的样子。{/n}“老实说，我刚刚开始逃亡的时候，并没打算来到这片落后的星区，亲爱的。噢，真的，不过我之所以会来到这里，是因为我听说这片地区有着难以想象的自由。每个能在这种地方活下去的人，都可以慷慨地享受自由的生活。这里所有的大门都是敞开的，你可以成为圣人、大亨、未来的统治者，或是你想要成为的任何人，真的。在这里，只要别躺在路边怨天尤人，而是为了灵魂、荣耀、钱袋，或是其他让你心动的东西努力工作，你的付出就都会得到回报。我已经习惯于努力工作，也因此得到了我的回报。”
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}... A gorgeous name, isn't it?" {n}Jae closes her eyes for a moment in an exaggerated show of pleasure.{/n} "But this backwater wasn't my original destination when I escaped, shereen. Oh no, it was the rumours of incredible freedom that brought me to the Koronus Expanse, freedom that is generously bestowed upon everyone who can survive in these parts. All doors are open here — you can become a saint, a mogul, a kingmaker, or anyone you like, really. I'm used to working hard. And so I found my blessing."

languages.text: «La {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}... Un nombre precioso, ¿no le parece?». {n}Jae cierra los ojos por un momento en una muestra exagerada de deleite.{/n} «Pero este agujero no era mi destino original cuando me fugué, shereen. Oh, no, fueron los rumores de libertad sin límites lo que me trajo hasta la Extensión de Koronus, una libertad que es el privilegio innegable de todo aquel que consigue sobrevivir aquí. Todas las puertas están abiertas: puedes ser un santo, un magnate, una mano en la sombra o cualquier otra cosa, realmente. Aquí, el trabajo duro tiene su recompensa, a menos que acostumbres a tumbarte en la calle y quejarte en lugar de esforzarte por el bien de tu alma, gloria, cartera o lo que sea que te motive. Yo estoy acostumbrada al trabajo duro, de modo que encontré mi bendición».
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}... A gorgeous name, isn't it?" {n}Jae closes her eyes for a moment in an exaggerated show of pleasure.{/n} "But this backwater wasn't my original destination when I escaped, shereen. Oh no, it was the rumours of incredible freedom that brought me to the Koronus Expanse, freedom that is generously bestowed upon everyone who can survive in these parts. Oh, no, fueron los rumores de libertad sin límites lo que me trajo hasta la Extensión de Koronus, una libertad que es el privilegio innegable de todo aquel que consigue sobrevivir aquí. Todas las puertas están abiertas: puedes ser un santo, un magnate, una mano en la sombra o cualquier otra cosa, realmente. Aquí, el trabajo duro tiene su recompensa, a menos que acostumbres a tumbarte en la calle y quejarte en lugar de esforzarte por el bien de tu alma, gloria, cartera o lo que sea que te motive. Yo estoy acostumbrada al trabajo duro, de modo que encontré mi bendición».

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}…壮大な名前じゃないかい？」{n}ジェイは一瞬目を閉じ、大げさに喜びを見せた。{/n}「でも、この僻地は、アタシが脱出したときの最初の目的地じゃなかったんだ。ああ、信じられないような自由があるという噂が、アタシをコロヌス・エクスパンスに連れてきたんだ。ここではすべての扉が開かれている。聖人にも、大物にも、キングメーカーにも、好きな人になれる。自分の魂のため、栄光のため、財布のため、あるいは自分の船に乗るもののために働く代わりに、道端に寝そべって文句を言うことに慣れていない限り、ここでは努力は報われる。アタシは一生懸命働くことに慣れている。そうして自分の祝福を見つけたのさ」
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}... A gorgeous name, isn't it?" {n}Jae closes her eyes for a moment in an exaggerated show of pleasure.{/n} "But this backwater wasn't my original destination when I escaped, shereen. Oh no, it was the rumours of incredible freedom that brought me to the Koronus Expanse, freedom that is generously bestowed upon everyone who can survive in these parts. All doors are open here — you can become a saint, a mogul, a kingmaker, or anyone you like, really. Here, hard work pays off, unless you're used to lying by the roadside and complaining instead of toiling for the good of your soul, glory, wallet, or whatever floats your boat. I'm used to working hard. And so I found my blessing."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}…壮大な名前じゃないかい？」{n}ジェイは一瞬目を閉じ、大げさに喜びを見せた。{/n}「でも、この僻地は、アタシが脱出したときの最初の目的地じゃなかったんだ。ああ、信じられないような自由があるという噂が、アタシをコロヌス・エクスパンスに連れてきたんだ。ここではすべての扉が開かれている。聖人にも、大物にも、キングメーカーにも、好きな人になれる。自分の魂のため、栄光のため、財布のため、あるいは自分の船に乗るもののために働く代わりに、道端に寝そべって文句を言うことに慣れていない限り、ここでは努力は報われる。アタシは一生懸命働くことに慣れている。そうして自分の祝福を見つけたのさ」

languages.text: "Die {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} ... Wunderschöner Name, nicht wahr?" {n}Jae schließt einen Augenblick die Augen, eine übertriebene Darstellung der Wonne ob des hübschen Namens.{/n} "Aber diese verschlafene Gegend war zu Beginn meiner Flucht nicht mein eigentliches Reiseziel, Shereen. Oh nein, es waren die Gerüchte von unglaublicher Freiheit, die mich in die Koronus-Ausdehnung führten. Freiheit, die großzügig jedem gewährt wird, der hier überleben kann. Hier stehen alle Türen offen — man kann ein Heiliger werden, ein Mogul, ein Königsmacher. Was immer man möchte, im Grunde. Hier zahlt sich harte Arbeit aus. Außer, man ist es gewohnt, am Wegrand zu liegen und sich zu beklagen, anstatt zu schuften — ob für das Wohl der Seele, des Rufs, des Geldbeutels oder was einen eben glücklich macht. Ich bin es gewohnt, zu schuften. Daher habe ich meinen Segen gefunden."
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}... A gorgeous name, isn't it?" {n}Jae closes her eyes for a moment in an exaggerated show of pleasure.{/n} "But this backwater wasn't my original destination when I escaped, shereen. Oh no, it was the rumours of incredible freedom that brought me to the Koronus Expanse, freedom that is generously bestowed upon everyone who can survive in these parts. All doors are open here — you can become a saint, a mogul, a kingmaker, or anyone you like, really. Here, hard work pays off, unless you're used to lying by the roadside and complaining instead of toiling for the good of your soul, glory, wallet, or whatever floats your boat. I'm used to working hard. And so I found my blessing."

Wunderschöner Name, nicht wahr?" {n}Jae schließt einen Augenblick die Augen, eine übertriebene Darstellung der Wonne ob des hübschen Namens.{/n} "Aber diese verschlafene Gegend war zu Beginn meiner Flucht nicht mein eigentliches Reiseziel, Shereen. Oh nein, es waren die Gerüchte von unglaublicher Freiheit, die mich in die Koronus-Ausdehnung führten. Freiheit, die großzügig jedem gewährt wird, der hier überleben kann. Hier stehen alle Türen offen — man kann ein Heiliger werden, ein Mogul, ein Königsmacher. Was immer man möchte, im Grunde. Hier zahlt sich harte Arbeit aus. Außer, man ist es gewohnt, am Wegrand zu liegen und sich zu beklagen, anstatt zu schuften — ob für das Wohl der Seele, des Rufs, des Geldbeutels oder was einen eben glücklich macht. Ich bin es gewohnt, zu schuften. Daher habe ich meinen Segen gefunden."

languages.text: « Les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}... Un nom magnifique, vous ne trouvez pas ? » {n}Jae ferme les yeux un instant en affectant un plaisir exagéré.{/n} « Mais je n'avais pas prévu de me réfugier au milieu de nulle part lorsque j'ai pris la fuite, shereen. Oh non, ce qui m'a amenée dans les Étendues de Koronus, ce sont les rumeurs de l'incroyable liberté généreusement offerte à tous ceux qui parviennent à y survivre. Ici, toutes les portes sont ouvertes : que vous vouliez devenir un saint, un magnat, un faiseur de rois ou quoi que ce soit d'autre, tout est possible. Les efforts sont récompensés, sauf si vous êtes du genre à vous vautrer dans le caniveau en vous plaignant au lieu d'œuvrer pour le salut de votre âme, la gloire, l'argent ou je ne sais quoi. Moi qui ai l'habitude de travailler dur, j'ai trouvé ma place ici. »
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}... A gorgeous name, isn't it?" {n}Jae closes her eyes for a moment in an exaggerated show of pleasure.{/n} "But this backwater wasn't my original destination when I escaped, shereen. Oh no, it was the rumours of incredible freedom that brought me to the Koronus Expanse, freedom that is generously bestowed upon everyone who can survive in these parts. All doors are open here — you can become a saint, a mogul, a kingmaker, or anyone you like, really. Here, hard work pays off, unless you're used to lying by the roadside and complaining instead of toiling for the good of your soul, glory, wallet, or whatever floats your boat. I'm used to working hard. And so I found my blessing."

traits.locale_text: « Les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}... Un nom magnifique, vous ne trouvez pas ? » {n}Jae ferme les yeux un instant en affectant un plaisir exagéré.{/n} « Mais je n'avais pas prévu de me réfugier au milieu de nulle part lorsque j'ai pris la fuite, shereen. Oh non, ce qui m'a amenée dans les Étendues de Koronus, ce sont les rumeurs de l'incroyable liberté généreusement offerte à tous ceux qui parviennent à y survivre. Ici, toutes les portes sont ouvertes : que vous vouliez devenir un saint, un magnat, un faiseur de rois ou quoi que ce soit d'autre, tout est possible. Les efforts sont récompensés, sauf si vous êtes du genre à vous vautrer dans le caniveau en vous plaignant au lieu d'œuvrer pour le salut de votre âme, la gloire, l'argent ou je ne sais quoi. Moi qui ai l'habitude de travailler dur, j'ai trouvé ma place ici. »

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}. İhtişamlı bir isim, değil mi?" {n}Jae, bir anlığına gözlerini kapatıp abartılı bir mutluluk sergiliyor.{/n} "Kaçtığımda ilk tercihim, kimsenin umurunda olmayan bu çöplük değildi şirinim. Hayır, beni Koronus Enginliği'ne getiren şey, sonsuz özgürlük söylentileri oldu. Bu civarlarda hayatta kalabilenlere cömertçe sunulan bir özgürlük. Burada bütün kapılar açık: Aziz olabilirsin, önder olabilirsin, başa geçebilirsin, kim olmak istiyorsan gerçekten o olabilirsin. Uğraşlarının karşılığını alırsın. Yolun kenarında yere uzanıp her şeyden şikâyet etmek yerine ruhuna, namına, cüzdanına veya her neyine istiyorsan ona iyi gelecek bir şeyler yaptığın sürece böyle. Ben çok çalışmaya alışığımdır, dolayısıyla burada tam da aradığımı buldum."
languages.original_text: "The {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}... A gorgeous name, isn't it?" {n}Jae closes her eyes for a moment in an exaggerated show of pleasure.{/n} "But this backwater wasn't my original destination when I escaped, shereen. Oh no, it was the rumours of incredible freedom that brought me to the Koronus Expanse, freedom that is generously bestowed upon everyone who can survive in these parts. All doors are open here — you can become a saint, a mogul, a kingmaker, or anyone you like, really. Here, hard work pays off, unless you're used to lying by the roadside and complaining instead of toiling for the good of your soul, glory, wallet, or whatever floats your boat. I'm used to working hard. And so I found my blessing."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}. İhtişamlı bir isim, değil mi?" {n}Jae bir anlığına gözlerini kapatıp abartılı bir mutluluk sergiliyor.{/n} "Kaçtığımda ilk tercihim bu kimsenin umurunda olmayan çöplük değildi ama şirinim. Hayır, beni Koronus Enginliği'ne getiren şey sonsuz özgürlük söylentileriydi. Burada hayatta kalabilenlerin eline cömertçe sunulan bir özgürlük. Burada bütün kapılar açık: Aziz olabilirsin, önder olabilirsin, başa geçebilirsin, kim olmak istiyorsan onu gerçekten olabilirsin. Burada uğraşlarının karşılığını alırsın. Yolun kenarında yere uzanıp her şeyden şikâyet etmek yerine ruhuna, namına, cüzdanına veya her neyine istiyorsan ona iyi gelecek bir şeyler uğruna çalıştığın sürece. Ben çok çalışmaya alışığımdır, dolayısıyla burada tam aradığım şeyi buldum."
